summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chief - Your AI Chief of Staff application. All backend APIs are functional and all frontend features are working correctly. Landing page renders properly with all required UI elements and interactions. Dashboard redirect behavior works as expected.
passed_tests: Task CRUD operations: POST /api/tasks creates task with proper response
GET /api/decisions returns empty array for unknown session
Landing page renders with all required data-testid elements
Hero title 'Your AI Chief of Staff' displays correctly
Connect Google Calendar button is visible and clickable
All 3 feature cards render with proper data-testid attributes
Connect button successfully navigates to Google OAuth
Dashboard route /dashboard redirects to landing page when no session_id
